version_description:
Stability and improvement is a key.
Lots of improvement and creepy issues clearing.

Improved balance for number of Clients that come to train.

Even greater features are coming next. Stay tuned!

0.7.1

Play with Friends from now on!

You can now play properly on multiple devices without losing progress. 
Connect to famous social network to secure your game profile and view your friend's Gym.
Want to share your greatness with best friend? You can invite him to play together.

Myriads of smaller improvements.

Headquarters, Leader-board and Group challenge are coming next! Stay tuned and have fun!

Quick fix!

Collecting Juices will not lead you to bankruptcy anymore!

Sorry for the inconvenience.

Hello Champs!

Here is small update to improve your experience quality, and little fixes here and there.

Stay Tuned!
More is coming.
Bug fixes, polishing and improvements;

What's new:
Bug fixes, polishing and improvements;
Minor bug fixes, polishing and improvements;

Dear My Gym Friends! 

We are happy to announce that My Gym update 1.5.0  is ready to be downloaded!
 
IN THIS UPDATE:
FOLLOW OTHER PLAYERS: add other gamers to your in-game followers list. 
PLAY TOGETHER: ask your friends and followers to help you out with the equipment repair and vice versa.
GYM EXPANSION REDESIGN: the rules for the expansion have been changed, now you need to choose the new area for expansion first and then expand it.
WHEEL OF FORTUNE: old issues related to recieving rewards and unclickable button on the wheel are fixed! 
OTHER FIXES: some other little bugs and inaccuracies are fixed. The game performance and game stability has been improved. 
 
Update your game and share your opinion.

We are happy to announce that My Gym update 1.5.1  is ready to be downloaded!
 
IN THIS UPDATE:
FOLLOW OTHER PLAYERS: add other gamers to your in-game followers list. 
PLAY TOGETHER: ask your friends and followers to help you out with the equipment repair and vice versa.
GYM EXPANSION REDESIGN: the rules for the expansion have been changed, now you need to choose the new area for expansion first and then expand it.
WHEEL OF FORTUNE: old issues related to recieving rewards and unclickable button on the wheel are fixed! 
OTHER FIXES: some other little bugs and inaccuracies are fixed. The game performance and game stability has been improved. 
 
Update your game and share your opinion.

IN THIS UPDATE:
GLOBAL VIEW: Manage your property more easily by zooming out the game to global view, now see every object in your town as a short sketch. 
FIXES: Daily gifts are back in the game! And all issues related to video ads., Wheel of Fortune, and a lot more are fixed. 
 
Update your game and share your opinion in comments. 
 
Enjoy the game!

WHAT'S NEW:
Watch a short commercial to double workout earnings!   
 
Bug Fixes:
Characters will no longer stuck outside of the Gym.  
Wheel of Fortune window now displays correct information about remaining spins, spins reset timer and when commercials are unavailable.
 
Please let us know what you think about this update and continue to share your feedback and ideas. Be on the lookout for upcoming announcements about our exciting new features!
 
Thanks for playing!

Dear My Gym players! 
Happy Thanksgiving day to you! Enjoy your holiday time along with updated My Gym!

IN THIS UPDATE:
• Don't miss out on our Thanksgiving Special Offer. 
• Enjoy the new decor!
• Game stability and boot time are improved. 
• The profile synchronization system is improved. Now, the possibility to lose game save is minimized!  
• Many other little bugs are fixed.

Enjoy the game!

Spread the joy! My Gym: Holiday Season is now available!

Santa is so happy to meet you! Join him in Holiday Season celebration!
In this update:

HAPPY FESTIVE HOLIDAYS!
* It’s beginning to look a lot like Christmas! Let it SNOW!
* Discover the festive decorations in the seasonal SHOP!
* Hum along with the Holiday TUNES!

GET READY FOR HOLIDAY CHALLENGE!
* Take on the Holiday CHALLENGE: train clients and win amazing Christmas rewards!
* Exchange Christmas items for unique and limited Holiday DECORATIONS!
* Open up GIFTS from friends and give away gifts to friends! 

Also:
* The broken equipment in your Gym will  finally be fixed!
* Issues with validation of payments were successfully fixed.

Check out the festive update and don’t forget to invite your friends!

Dear Players
While you are waiting for a new major update, here is a new version with a small (but important) improvement:

• Item movement and rotation was improved due to a numerous demands; (no more annoying Camera jumps)

Stay Tuned!

Dear Players
While you are waiting for a new major update, here is a new version with a small (but important) improvement:

Stay Tuned
Fixed the recent bug with an athlete in the game. Now, you can train him and participate in sport events again!

Quick fix

• Fixed crash reporting

Sorry for inconvenience

Thank you for keep playing our game!
